EmailTemplate.name: October 12 Webinar-Neal
EmailTemplate.subject: October 12 Webinar: A New Look at Business Models for Digital Health
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Good evening, I hope this email finds you well. Livongo Chief Medical Officer, Dr. Jennifer Schneider, will be participating in an upcoming webinar, A New Look at Business Models for Digital Health, and I thought it might be interesting to you.
Separately, I'd love to touch base and see how things are going at {!Account.Name}. Are you available for a phone call the week of October 16?
More information on the webinar can be found here.
Let me know.
Thanks,
Neal Lewis Regional Vice President Livongo m: 239.633.0482 e: nlewis@livongo.com a: 3960 Deep Passage Way, Naples, FL 34109 www.livongo.com
